title: Size effects in superfluid field emission.
abstract: A detailed experimental investigation has been made of the influence of chamber dimensions on field emission characteristics in liquid 4He. The current was found to be a strong function of the emitter-collector separation, in satisfactory quantitative agreement with the predictions of a simple theory
